forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: hand colors

comments.text: to change your hand colors, pick the color pen while in me-mode and pick a color.
you can also create custom hands: pick the thing  "..." setting "replaces hand when worn", then put on this creation in me-mode.
also see video - by ferny - [youtube: owFFFJtwz7Y]

thread.latestCommentText: also see video - by ferny - [youtube: owFFFJtwz7Y]
